channel.title: iBook on Finally, William started his blog?
channel.description: Recent content in iBook on Finally, William started his blog?

item.title: Restoring an iBook Clamshell G3/466 SE
item.description: It’s now been over four months since I made the iBook purchase and realized my OS9 dreams. Although I haven’t had as much time (yet!) to enjoy the fruits of my labor as I would like, I thought it would be a good to idea to outline my journey - from surfing eBay to scouring my closet for old MacAddict CDs - to any others out there looking to scratch that classic mac nostalgia itch.
